name: The Adventures of a Hero
description:
With voices taunting in the shadows, and weird artifacts found around the town. You will set out on a mysterious adventure to find out WHO you are, or you will die trying.

The Adventures of a Hero is a game about a young adult who finds himself with memory loss in a apocalyptic future with Dragons, Trolls, Zombies, and more. You must find your memory's in the town of Ragnarok, which is on the Edge of nowhere.
